title: PRD ReDesign: Main Homepage
background_context: The homepage is the primary entry point for both new and returning users. With ~590K monthly landings (497K new, 110K returning), we must ensure a seamless and trustworthy user journey. Current analytics highlight strong engagement at the navigation tabs (69% reach), but weak depth of scroll (only 10% past 'How it works') and a bounce rate of 16%. Conversion to paid orders within 24h is 7.31%.

new_visitors.characteristics: Likely arrive from marketing campaigns or organic search
new_visitors.priorities: trust, anonymity, security, fast delivery, easy navigation to relevant treatment

returning_visitors.characteristics: Previously purchased or explored our services
returning_visitors.priorities: reassurance of consistent service and motivation to repurchase

success_metrics: Maintain or improve bounce rate (currently 16%, target ≤ 12%)
Fast page loading: Google considers <2.5s LCP as 'Good' speed. Target Google PageSpeed score: ≥90
Conversion: Improve from 7.31% to ≥8.04% (+10%) from homepage view → paid order within 24h

development_requirements.description: The system must define for each user (when possible) whether the user is male or female and which category they belong to, in order to display personalized homepage content. If the user is new and arrives via marketing campaign with URL parameter like utm_category=ED, define as ED user. If returning user, identify category of most recent purchase. Smart Logic personalizes hero, category drilldown, and CTAs.
Display black USP component at top of page. USPs rotate automatically at fixed speed. 'Why us' text remains static. Entire component is sticky during scroll. Mobile displays one USP at a time.
Add sticky navigation bar with: company logo, search icon, hamburger menu, My Account icon. Navbar remains visible while scrolling.
Add Anchor Bar below navbar displaying CRM content (coupon or banner). Anchor Bar is sticky during scroll.

Hero section contains: H1 title carousel with rotating categories, static line 'Made easy with DoktorABC', subtitle (localized), search bar, Trusted Reviews widget, CTA button 'All Treatments'. Button becomes sticky when scrolled past.
Display top categories in exact order. Each item links to category page. Note alternating images and animation in desktop version.
Add static 'How It Works' section explaining service flow in clear, simple visual layout. Note animation in desktop version.
Static section with metric blocks: 600K+ customers, 7+ years of trust, 40+ categories, 3M orders delivered. Center image is static but inner USPs rotate in sync with header.
